languages.text: "Я не хожу путями, угодными Наместнику Владайму". {n}Иеронимус сводит брови.{/n} "Он слаб и червив внутри. Он угождает своим хозяевам из {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллики{/g}, этим торговцам реликвиями богопротивных {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Я не хожу путями, угодными наместнику Владайму". {n}Иеронимус сводит брови.{/n} "Он слаб и червив внутри. Он угождает своим хозяевам из Касбаллики, этим торговцам реликвиями богопротивных ксеносов".

languages.text: "I do not walk the paths pleasing to the Liege." {n}Hieronymus frowns.{/n} "Vladaym is weak and riddled with worms on the inside. He seeks to please his {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} masters, those peddlers of relics of the unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Я не хожу путями, угодными Наместнику Владайму". {n}Иеронимус сводит брови.{/n} "Он слаб и червив внутри. Он угождает своим хозяевам из {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллики{/g}, этим торговцам реликвиями богопротивных {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "I do not walk the paths preferable to Liege Vladaym." {n}Hieronimus frowns.{/n} "He is weak and ridden with worms on the inside. He seeks to please his Kasballica masters, those peddlers of relics of the unholy xenos."

"I do not walk the paths preferable to Liege Vladaym." {n}Hieronimus frowns.{/n} "He is weak and ridden with worms on the inside. He seeks to please his Kasballica masters, those peddlers of relics of the unholy xenos."

"I do not walk the paths pleasing to the Liege." {n}Hieronymus frowns.{/n} "Vladaym is weak and riddled with worms on the inside. He seeks to please his Kasballican masters, those peddlers of relics of the unholy xenos."

"I do not walk the paths pleasing to the Liege." {n}Hieronymus frowns.{/n} "Vladaym is weak and riddled with worms on the inside. He seeks to please his Kasballican masters, those peddlers of relics of the unholy xenos."

"I do not walk the paths pleasing to the Liege." {n}Hieronymus frowns.{/n} "Vladaym is weak and riddled with worms on the inside. He seeks to please his {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} masters, those peddlers of relics of the unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}."

languages.text: “我不想走上讨好总督的道路。”{n}希罗尼穆斯皱起了眉头。{/n}“弗拉迪姆很软弱，灵魂中到处都是蛀虫。他想取悦他在{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}的主人们，那群倒卖邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}遗物的人。”
languages.original_text: "I do not walk the paths pleasing to the Liege." {n}Hieronymus frowns.{/n} "Vladaym is weak and riddled with worms on the inside. He seeks to please his {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} masters, those peddlers of relics of the unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “我不想走上讨好总督的道路。”{n}希罗尼穆斯皱起了眉头。{/n}“弗拉迪姆很软弱，灵魂中到处都是蛀虫。他想取悦他在{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}的主人们，那群倒卖邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}遗物的人。”

languages.text: «No camino por los senderos que satisfacen al señor». {n}Hieronymus frunce el ceño.{/n} «Vladaym es débil y su interior está plagado de gusanos. Busca complacer a sus maestros {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, portadores de reliquias de los impíos {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}».
languages.original_text: "I do not walk the paths pleasing to the Liege." {n}Hieronymus frowns.{/n} "Vladaym is weak and riddled with worms on the inside. He seeks to please his {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} masters, those peddlers of relics of the unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «No camino por los senderos que satisfacen al señor». {n}Hieronymus frunce el ceño.{/n} «Vladaym es débil y su interior está plagado de gusanos. Busca complacer a sus maestros {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, portadores de reliquias de los impíos {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}».

languages.text: 「私は領主に媚びを売るつもりはございません」{n}ヒエロニムスは顔をしかめた。{/n}「ヴラダイムは弱く、卑しい心を持っている。彼は不浄の{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の遺物を売りさばく、{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}の主たちを喜ばせようとしている」
languages.original_text: "I do not walk the paths pleasing to the Liege." {n}Hieronymus frowns.{/n} "Vladaym is weak and riddled with worms on the inside. He seeks to please his {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} masters, those peddlers of relics of the unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「私は領主に媚びを売るつもりはございません」{n}ヒエロニムスは顔をしかめた。{/n}「ヴラダイムは弱く、卑しい心を持っている。彼は不浄の{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の遺物を売りさばく、{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}の主たちを喜ばせようとしている」

languages.text: "Ich beschreite Wege, die dem Lehnsherren nicht gefallen." {n}Hieronymus verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Vladaym ist schwach und innerlich wurmzerfressen. Er will seinen {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}-Meistern gefallen, diesen Hausierern mit Relikten der unheiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}."
languages.original_text: "I do not walk the paths pleasing to the Liege." {n}Hieronymus frowns.{/n} "Vladaym is weak and riddled with worms on the inside. He seeks to please his {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} masters, those peddlers of relics of the unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Ich beschreite Wege, die dem Lehnsherren nicht gefallen." {n}Hieronymus verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Vladaym ist schwach und innerlich wurmzerfressen. Er will seinen {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}-Meistern gefallen, diesen Hausierern mit Relikten der unheiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}."

languages.text: « Je n'emprunte pas les chemins qui plaisent au suzerain. » {n}Le visage de Hiéronymus se ferme.{/n} « Vladaym est faible et rongé par les vers. Il ne cherche qu'à satisfaire ses maîtres de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, ces colporteurs de reliques de {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} impies. »
languages.original_text: "I do not walk the paths pleasing to the Liege." {n}Hieronymus frowns.{/n} "Vladaym is weak and riddled with worms on the inside. He seeks to please his {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} masters, those peddlers of relics of the unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'emprunte pas les chemins qui plaisent suzerain. » {n}Le visage de Hiéronymus se ferme.{/n} « Vladaym est faible et rongé par les vers. Il ne cherche qu'à satisfaire ses maîtres de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, ces colporteurs de reliques de {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} impies. »

languages.text: "Emîr'i hoşnut edecek yollarda yürümüyorum." {n}Hieronymus kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Vladaym zayıf. İçini kurtlar kemirmiş. Uğursuz {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenoların{/g} yadigârlarını satan {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} efendilerine yaltaklanmak için çalışıyor."
languages.original_text: "I do not walk the paths pleasing to the Liege." {n}Hieronymus frowns.{/n} "Vladaym is weak and riddled with worms on the inside. He seeks to please his {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} masters, those peddlers of relics of the unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Emîr'le aramı iyi tutmak gibi bir niyetim yok." {n}Hieronymus kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Vladaym zayıf. İçini kurtlar kemirmiş. Kahrolası {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g}ların yadigârlarını satan {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} efendilerine yaltaklanmak için çalışıyor."
